Text: Re FPL follow up itemit just fine Thanks Tana Jones AM Serge That was sent to you yesterday morning I guess you didnt get it
Re FPL follow up itemit just fine Thanks Tana Jones AM Serge That was sent to you yesterday morning I guess you didnt get it

Re your request for FPL Energy Power Marketing FPL ISDA MasterAgreement Cc The second FPL entity is FPL Energy Power Marketing Inc It is the FPL entity that handles all trades for the nonregulated business units of FPL We completed the ISDA agreements between Florida Power Light Co the regulated utility and ENA in early January and I then sent you on January th a redline of the FPL Energy Power Marketing IncENA drafts vs the final executed Florida Power Light CoENA agreements for ease of review since the agreements were near twins though you may also recall that we had added a guaranty of FPL Group Capital Inc FPL Energy Power Marketing Inc debt is unrated FPL Group Capital Inc debt is single A I appreciate you assistance in helping to move this along Regards Serge Serge G Martin Steel Hector Davis LLP South Biscayne Blvd Miami Florida phone fax PM Serge Sorry to take so long to respond A few things What is the correct legal name of the entity you are inquiring about Is it the unregulated marketing arm of the regulated utility There has not been a commercial push from the ENA perspective to set up a new agreement with FPL which explains why I cannot get our credit goup to react Ill broach the topic again when I hear from you Please let me know if you have any other questions Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB a Houston Texas phone fax

Enron Florida Power Light Company IDSA Docs Cc Attached for your review please find a blacklined copy of the FPLEnron ISDA master agreement marked to show changes from your last draft Also attached are the credit support annex form of LOC and form of guaranty with our changes to your initial drafts The changes in this set of drafts are light in the master a little heavier in the annex and heaviest with respect to the proposed guaranty Please provide us with your comments or approval of the enclosed drafts Regards Serge Serge G Martin Steel Hector Davis LLP South Biscayne Blvd Miami Florida voice fax DOC DOC

FPL Enron ISDA Agreements Attached Filesand Jason The changes you last sent with regard to this matter were all acceptable to FPL and we agree the documents are in final form except however for the Enron guaranty I have enclosed clean and marked copies of the guaranty with those revisions we would request and I would hope that none of them would be controversial In the hope that the enclosures might upon your approval of the revised guaranty be a final set I have also enclosed a clean copy of the ISDA Schedule in the form agreed upon I have not enclosed a marked copy as the only new changes are in the guaranty attached as Exhibit A thereto Please advise Serge Serge G Martin Steel Hector Davis LLP South Biscayne Blvd Miami Florida phone fax DOC DOC DOC

EnronFlorida Power Light Company ISDA agreements Cc Enclosed in re the EnronFPL ISDA agreements is the revised guaranty we discussed today Please let me know if the revisions meet with your approval so Sara and I can proceed to finalize this and the related agreements as well as prepare the corresponding agreements for Enron and FPL Energy Power Marketing Inc the nonregulated FPL affiliate we discussed Thank you Serge Serge G Martin Steel Hector Davis LLP South Biscayne Blvd Miami Florida phone fax DOC

Enron Florida Power Light Company IDSA Docs Cc Attached for your review please find a blacklined copy of the FPLEnron ISDA master agreement marked to show changes from your last draft Also attached are the credit support annex form of LOC and form of guaranty with our changes to your initial drafts The changes in this set of drafts are light in the master a little heavier in the annex and heaviest with respect to the proposed guaranty Please provide us with your comments or approval of the enclosed drafts Regards Serge Serge G Martin Steel Hector Davis LLP South Biscayne Blvd Miami Florida voice fax DOC DOC
